Name: $v0-$v1
Function_Use: Values for Function Results and Expression Evaluation

Name: $a0-$a3
Function_Use: Function parameters, not preserved by sub-programs

Name: $t0-$t7
Function_Use: Temporary data, not preserved by subprograms

Name: $t8-$t9
Function_Use: Temporary data, not preserved by subprograms

Name: $k0-$k1
Function_Use: Reserved for interrupt handler. Don't use!

Name: $gp
Function_Use: Global Area Pointer (base of global data segment)

Name: $sp
Function_Use: Stack Pointer, points to the top of the stack, used in function calls and returns

Name: $fp
Function_Use: Frame Pointer, points to the base of the current stack frame, used to access local variables

Name: $ra
Function_Use: Return Address, stores the return address for function calls

Name: $status
Function_Use: Processor status register, used for storing system status and control bits

Name: $cause
Function_Use: Cause of the last exception, used by the exception handler

Name: $epc
Function_Use: Exception Program Counter, holds the address to return to after an exception

Name: $badvaddr
Function_Use: Bad virtual address, stores the address that caused the exception

Name: $index
Function_Use: Index register used in TLB operations
